description: ## Add/Modify: Consortium\n\nA consortium is a group of institutions working together. Select the member institutions below.

label: UI Label
description: Full display name of the consortium

label: Description
description: Detailed description of the consortium and its purpose

label: URL
description: Website or reference URL for the consortium

label: Member Institutions
description: Select all institutions that are members of this consortium. You may select more than one.

label: Other Institutions
description: If member institutions are not listed above enter their names here (comma-separated). These institutions should be registered first.

label: Additional Collaborators
description: To add attribution to additional members include their GitHub usernames (only) separated by a comma.
